TopicTitle: Celebrate the Kerbin Cup with Official Mods and a Community Contest!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1jnBU9q"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/72d78384802fe986ade5640445c17b4a/tumblr_inline_n72yjvzbzA1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>While the World Cup kicks off in Brazil, Squad is launching festivities up in the stars with an official mod pack and community competition centered around the familiar planet of Kerbin. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s time to celebrate the Kerbin Cup!<br/><br/><a href="http://bit.ly/1jnBU9q"><strong>OFFICIAL MODPACK</strong></a><br/>Squad has released its first-ever official Kerbal Space Program modpack on Curse. The Kerbin Cup pack contains Kerbal-sized and rocket-sized <a href="http://i.imgur.com/lZfhPjA.jpg"><strong>SOCCER BALLS</strong></a> with the physics to match, as well as the flags of all 32 World Cup participating countries. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s both a small token of gratitude and a way to capture the excitement of one of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s biggest sporting events, but in the grand stage that only space can provide.<br/><br/><a href="http://bit.ly/1pPqVuy"><strong>COMMUNITY COMPETITION</strong></a><br/>Represent your KSP community home and compete in the Kerbin Cup contest! Reddit and The Forum will square off in a weekly, elimination-based competition where prizes and pride are on the line. Mystery, creativity and the community voice will rule over all.<br/><br/>Have fun and enjoy!</p>
ooh, I bet on manley and cupcakes to win!
Looks like fun, but I haven't seen a readme or instructions anywhere. Drop it in the Gamedata folder?

Soccer research commencing . . .

:-)
If only there was a stadium that we could land our soccer rockets in!

ooh, I bet on manley

If a random KSP redditor posted a picture of Mr Manley successfully tying his shoelace it would be on the front page for a week, so yeah.
Now all we need is an excitable commentator. Hey Jeb?
Anyway we can get the top image as a wallpaper, without the text + logos? =D
Well, don't get me wrong, but what I'm really looking forward to is what will be created based on the new module (landing legs? jumpsticks? hovercrafts?)

Well, don't get me wrong, but what I'm really looking forward to is what will be created based on the new module (landing legs? jumpsticks? hovercrafts?)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Wont use it because I won't download anything from curse. Anything "exclusively" curse gets nothing from me.

Any chance for a mirror DL?

Oh, and I thought something like that was "not likely to happen" (that you can't get something (mod) anywhere else...) but SQUAD has made it so with their FIRST OFFICIAL MODPACK...only available on CURSED!

Edited June 13, 2014 by Ignath
Now if it had been spaceport 2 you would have downloaded it right

Now if it had been spaceport 2 you would have downloaded it right

Dropbox, Mega, Google Drive, Spaceport 2 would have all gotten my download. Curse will never again. My opinion, my choice, my right...what does it matter to you Virtualgenius; other than trying to start an online forum fight?
Not trying to start a fight just saying what was promised and what we got where totally diffrent

If only there was a stadium that we could land our soccer rockets in!

Actually, the futbols are separators. The big one has visible attachment nodes and the small one, while the nodes are not visible, does attach.

Edit: Now I have a nice flag collection; thank you Squad!

Dropbox, Mega, Google Drive, Spaceport 2 would have all gotten my download. Curse will never again. My opinion, my choice, my right...what does it matter to you Virtualgenius; other than trying to start an online forum fight?

I wanted to quickly comment on this post. It's absolutely your right to refuse to download anything from Curse and of course you can request a different download location, but I don't think your rant was all that justified otherwise. You're the one making the choice not to download from Curse which in my opinion means that you should also bear the consequences of it. Yes, if something is only available on Curse you won't download it, but that's your 'fault' and not Squad's. The general tone of your post does not seem to fit that way of thinking and is quite hostile, which I don't think is justified.
So, what exactly do these balls do? Are they for vertical or radial stacking? Are they elastic?

I trusted you Squad! Why did you have to get foolball involved?

EDIT: accidental typo is great

I wanted to quickly comment on this post. It's absolutely your right to refuse to download anything from Curse and of course you can request a different download location, but I don't think your rant was all that justified otherwise. You're the one making the choice not to download from Curse which in my opinion means that you should also bear the consequences of it. Yes, if something is only available on Curse you won't download it, but that's your 'fault' and not Squad's. The general tone of your post does not seem to fit that way of thinking and is quite hostile, which I don't think is justified.

I don't know where you're getting a rant from what I typed Kasper...perhaps a bit of a misunderstanding of what Virtualgenius intention was of his post...but certainly no rant there. Just said that ANY other download location pretty much would get my download...but not Curse.

You (SQUAD) as a company want to force people to use Curse as a location to download their first OFFICIAL mod pack and I was asking if there were any other place to go to get it...and requested a mirror to somewhere else. No rant there at all. Not "blaming" anyone...though you sure want to blame me for not wanting to go to Curse. My choice for not wanting to go to any website hosted by curse is due to past history and I fully have that right.

On a side note, I was already given the pack by a friendly community member, so the mirror is no longer relevant to me...I was just doing it as a service for anyone else who doesn't want to use Cursed.

Ignath, Curse is our official partner and we encourage everyone to give them a try. With them being such, it makes sense that we would want to put it up there. Did you have a look at the license, though? There is nothing stopping anyone from alternative hosting, getting it from a friend or doing pretty much whatever they want with it.
Can these soccer balls we used kind of like the airbags that were developed in an ancient mod some time ago (forgot the name)? I would love to use these as cushion during moderate impacts.
Judging by the imgur album KasperVld embedded a few posts up, somebody has already used them as a landing cushioning system.

Ignath, Curse is our official partner and we encourage everyone to give them a try. With them being such, it makes sense that we would want to put it up there. Did you have a look at the license, though? There is nothing stopping anyone from alternative hosting, getting it from a friend or doing pretty much whatever they want with it.

No Rowsdower, I didn't have a chance to check on the license yet and I appreciate you letting me know what the restrictions were/are.

I guess my concern was brought from the graphic that said "ONLY ON WWW.CURSE.COM" I was not trying to cause trouble or anything, so I apologize for any issue my posts may have caused.

Now all we need is an excitable commentator. Hey Jeb?
